name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed Ultimate Sith Edition
description:
This installer is for the retail version of the game with 2 DVDs.
This installer will copy the content of the first DVD to your Disk and run the setup from there. This is made to make the installer working as expected when changing disks.

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Activision/Star Wars The Force Unleashed/SWTFU Launcher.exe

merge.description: Extracting installation data from disc, please wait ...

execute.descritpion: Set proper file permissions for extracted data, please wait...

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Activision/Star Wars The Force Unleashed/SWTFU
    Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Bottle, please wait...
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert disc 1
    requires: setup.exe
- merge:
    description: Extracting installation data from disc, please wait ...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/swsetup
    src: $DISC
- execute:
    args: 744 -R $GAMEDIR/drive_c/swsetup
    descritpion: Set proper file permissions for extracted data, please wait...
    file: chmod
- task:
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/swsetup/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Dot.Net 3.6 Service Pack 1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: tkg-4.5-x86_64
